doc:
Ivor Beddoes https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ivor_Beddoes 0 Ivor William Gilmour Beddoes (28 April 1909 – 14 March 1981) was a British matte painter, sketch and storyboard artist, costume and set designer, painter, dancer, composer and poet. He is best known for his film work, spanning more than thirty years, from Black Narcissus and The Red Shoes to Star Wars and Superman. Ivor_William_Gilmour_Beddoes ( 28_April_1909 – 14_March_1981 ) was a_British_matte_painter , sketch_and_storyboard_artist , costume and set designer_,_painter_,_dancer_,_composer_and_poet . He is_best_known for his_film_work , spanning more_than_thirty_years , from Black_Narcissus and The_Red_Shoes to Star_Wars_and_Superman .
